name: discogs_scrape_marketplace
description: Scrape marketplace listings for a Discogs release. Returns seller, price, condition, and shipping.

steps.code: const listings = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr, [class*="MarketplaceItem"]')).slice(0,20).map(row => { const seller = row.querySelector('a[href*="/seller/"], .seller_info a')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const price = row.querySelector('.price, [class*="Price"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const cond = row.querySelector('.item_condition, [class*="Condition"]')?.textContent?.trim()?.replace(/\s+/g,' ')||''; const shipping = row.querySelector('.shipping_info, [class*="Shipping"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { seller, price, condition: cond, shipping }; }).filter(l=>l.price); return { release_id: '{{release_id}}', listings, url: window.location.href }
